name: Watchlist Tracker ( Aesthetic )
description: Simplify your entertainment tracking journey with this Watchlist Tracker Notion template.In this Notion template, you can track the movies and shows you watch. This is an aesthetically designed watchlist tracker to help you get more organized. Watchlist tracker preview and tutorial. Features: Status Tracking: Users can track the status of each item, whether it's "Watching," "Completed," "Pending," or any other custom status.Rating and Reviews: Users can rate shows or movies.Mobile Compatibility:
features: Status Tracking: Users can track the status of each item, whether it's "Watching," "Completed," "Pending," or any other custom status.; Rating and Reviews: Users can rate shows or movies.; Mobile Compatibility: the template is accessible and functional on mobile devices for convenience.; Customizable Categories: Users can categorize their shows and movies based on various criteria such as genre, streaming platform, etc.; Add a new entry with a button feature; Manage your shows and movies separately
